item.description:
Hey kids~

I'm thrilled to announce the next Indoor Recess show, New England edition, at the Middle East Upstairs on 12/1! I first saw our headliner, Spirit Kid (Boston), gracing the main stage at the Harvard Mayfair and was blown away by their sound - a cut above the rest in the local scene, they bring a more modern twist to Beatles-style pop-rock. In fact, the Beatles' influence is a thread that runs through the styles of all three performing bands: The Russians (Boston) are another polished psychedelic alternative act whose songs could've been stripped straight from a Beatles album, and while newer to the scene, The Famous Winters' (Providence) debut EP is riddled with a grungy earnestness that will break your damn heart in the best kind of way. Show's 18+, tickets are $10 in advance and $12 at the door, but if you're a smart cookie you'll nab one in advance not only to save some green on the ticket, but to get 20% off food the night of the show!

Check the bands here:

Spirit Kid: www.spiritkidmusic.com

The Russians: www.therussianembassy.com

The Famous Winters: www.facebook.com/thefamouswinters

Show fb link: http://www.facebook.c...

Show ticket link: http://www.ticketweb....

One of the best venues in town, some of the best bands in the area, the night's gonna be kickin' rad, and you're not going to want to miss it!
item.how_to_find_us: i'm going to be running the event so will be wandering around, but friends from meetup and yelp will be there, and i'll help connect! call my cell: 608-469-9444
item.name: Spirit Kid, The Russians, The Famous Winters @ Middle East Upstairs
